review: I love this! I can watch so many shows I have missed or see a rerun of a favorite show. Many options. So many choices for tv shows or movies, can always find something of interest. Very easy to set up. Good deal for the price.
author: Sonia M.

review: Still figuring out what can be watched and what has to be subscribed to.

review: It freed up my computer! Its great!!!

review: Everything and more. So convenient. The picture is great too.  I am very pleased.

review: It is good BUT I do not like the remote! ... I get double action, when I try and search I get extras of the same letter or number.. am always going to backspace!!!Also I do not like the FEEL of that remote.  I'm compairing it to ROKU remote, the ROKU remote is much better, sorry!The FIRE Stick is fine, works well, I'm satisfied with it.
